result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jerrin Christopher Walker

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

02:15 PM Defendant Jerrin Christopher Walker appeared by phone.  Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Matter continued to allow defendant time to submit Petition for Court appointed attorney.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Justice Point: Rock County Supervision Report
Adjourned initial appearance on October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Adjourned initial appearance on October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Original bench warrant returned from Beloit Police Department
Curfew between 7 PM and 7 AM. No contact with A.C.P. Court orders Level 3 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.

10:48 AM Defendant Jerrin Christopher Walker in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy in court for Jerrin Christopher Walker.  Attorney Richard Jay Sullivan in court for State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Defendant's address verified. Sworn testimony by the Defendant Jerrin Christopher Walker. Court finds the defendant indigent and appoints attorney Michael Murphy. Defendant to reimburse the County $30 per month. Signature bond set of $5000 with conditions. Curfew between 7 PM and 7 AM. No contact with A.C.P. Court orders Level 3 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Warrant vacated.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
